1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that:The Messenger of Allah wiped his ears, putting his forefingers in his ears and wiping the back of them with his thumbs, so he wiped them inside and out

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَسْحِ الأُذُنَيْنِ
